function renderLine( line, pattern) for i=1, strlen(pattern) do local c = strsub( pattern, i, i) if c =="#" then set_stone( "st-greenbrown", i-1, line) elseif c == "o" then oxyd( i-1, line) elseif c == "D" then set_stone( "st-death", i-1, line) elseif c == "W" then set_stone( "st-glass", i-1, line) elseif c == "!" then fill_floor("fl-water", i-1,line, 1,1) elseif c=="+" then set_stone( "st-wood", i-1, line) elseif c == "r" then set_stone("st-bolder", i-1,line, {direction=EAST}) elseif c=="g" then draw_stones("st-grate1",{i-1,line}, {1,1}, 1) elseif c=="l" then oneway(i-1,line, enigma.WEST) elseif c=="w" then set_actor("ac-whiteball-small", i,line+1, {player=0, mouseforce=1, essential=1}) elseif c=="H" then hollow(i-1,line) elseif c=="L" then set_attrib(laser(i-1,line, TRUE, NORTH), "name", "laser") elseif c=="F" then set_stone("st-switch", i-1,line, {action="openclose",target="door1"}) elseif c=="G" then doorh( i-1,line, {name="door1"}) elseif c=="s" then set_stone("st-stoneimpulse",i-1,line) elseif c=="%" then set_stone("st-stoneimpulse",i-1,line,{name="s1"}) elseif c=="S" then set_stone( "st-stoneimpulse-hollow", i-1,line) end end end
